Our Presence in Ouagadougou

GKS Logistics is present in Burkina Faso to serve the country's growing logistics needs. Our office in Ouagadougou offers transport and logistics solutions tailored to the Burkinabe market.

Central position in the Sahel
Qualified local team
Adapted solutions
Reliable service
Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso
